message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and potential benefits for you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice,  $15000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in your product but I'm only able to go up to $8000 at this time.  Let me know what you think!

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $8000 is lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to compromise. How about $10000? This would allow me to make a reasonable profit while still giving you a great deal. Let's see if we can find common ground!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested in your product, but I can't go higher than $9000.  If you're willing to meet me halfway, we can close this deal.
